line.text: When most I wink then do mine eyes best see
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For all the day they view things unrespected
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But when I sleep in dreams they look on thee
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And darkly bright are bright in dark directed
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Then thou whose shadow shadows doth make bright
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: How would thy shadow form form happy show
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To the clear day with thy much clearer light
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: When to unseeing eyes thy shade shines so
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: How would (I say) mine eyes be blessed made
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: By looking on thee in the living day
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: When in dead night thy fair imperfect shade
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Through heavy sleep on sightless eyes doth stay
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: All days are nights to see till I see thee
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And nights bright days when dreams do show thee me
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
